皍字的基本解释

皍
jí
古同“即”。

皍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》子力切，入職，精。］
亦作“卽1”。“皍1”的今字。
(1)就食。
(2)就；接近；靠近。
(3)至，到。
(4)乘；登。
(5)寻求。
(6)迎合；符合。
(7)依附；附着。
(8)按照；依据。
(9)就是。
(10)指当时，当天。亦表示以后不久的时间。
(11)连词。假若。
(12)连词。尽管；即使。
(13)连词。则。
(14)介词。当。
(15)介词。就在。
(16)副词。便；就。
(17)副词。特；只。
(18)烛头之烬。
(19)通“蝍”。参见“即且”。
(20)古代法律术语。
(21)姓。

皍字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皍； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页788第05
【字彙補】古文卽字。註詳卩部七畫。

皍字的源字形

皍字的起名意思

暂无。

皍
Basic explanation of words
皍
jí
Gu Tong is "that".
皍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" is a sublime, entry-level, fine-tuned. ]
Also known as "卽1". The present character of "皍1".
(1) Eat.
(2) Just; close; close.
(3) To, to.
(4) Multiply; board.
(5) Seek.
(6) To cater to; to meet.
(7) Attachment; attachment.
(8) According to; basis.
(9) Yes.
(10) Refers to the time and the day. It also means the time in the near future.
(11) Conjunctions. if.
(12) Conjunctions. Although; even though.
(13) Conjunctions. then.
(14) Prepositions. when.
(15) Prepositions. at.
(16) Adverbs. Then.
(17) Adverbs. Special; only.
(18) The embers of the candle head.
(19) Through "蝍". See "immediately".
(20) Ancient legal terms.
(21) Last name.
